charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the BOP for a term of 46 months. (The court recommends FCI-Lewisburg) The dft shall surrender for service before 2 PM on April 28, 1999. Upon release from prison the dft shall be on supervised release for 4 years. Dft shall pay $500.00 fine and $100.00 Spec. Assessment. (COUNT 2 IS DISMISSED ON MOTION BY THE GOVERNMENT). (1)
Count 2 dismissed on motion from government (2)

that the deft. Jimi Joseph Chesslock is hereby committed to the custody of the US BOP to be imprisoned for a term of 44 months. The court recommends that the BOP designate the least restrictive facility such as the federal prisons camps at Lewisburg or Allenwood as the place of service of this sentence. The court further recommends that, if eligible, the deft. be enrolled in the 500 hr. drug treatment program offered by the BOP. The deft. shall surrender for service of sentence at the institution designated by the BOP before 2:00 p.m. on 5/12/99. Upon release from imprisonment, the deft. shall be on supervised release for a term of 4 yrs. Deft. is advised of his right to appeal. The deft. shall pay a special assessment of $100 which shall be due immediately. It is ordered that the deft. pay a fine in the amt. of $500. The fine is payable during the period of incarceration only for the purpose of the inmate participating in the Inmate Financial Responsibility Program with the payment of any balance to be a condition of supervised release. The deft. shall pay the balance of the fine in monthly installments of at least $50. Counts 2,3,4 are dismissed. Schedule of Payments and Statement of Reasons attached. (1)

charges.charge_description: 18:924(c)-CARRYING AND USING A FIREARM IN RELATION TO DRUG TRAFFICKING (4)
